name: QuickLinksService

methods.name: getDefaultQuickLinks$
methods.rawdescription: Retrieves the default quick links for Cockpit Application.
methods.description: Retrieves the default quick links for Cockpit Application.

jsdoctags.comment: An observable emitting an array of quick links.

methods.name: getQuickLinksForDeviceManagement$
methods.rawdescription: Retrieves default quick links for Device Management Application
methods.description: Retrieves default quick links for Device Management Application

jsdoctags.comment: An observable emitting an array of quick links for device management.

description: Service for managing quick links in Cockpit and Device Management applications. It fetches, processes, and provides quick links to relevant documentation and navigation nodes.
rawdescription:
Service for managing quick links in Cockpit and Device Management applications.
It fetches, processes, and provides quick links to relevant documentation and navigation nodes.
